last_episode_to_air.name: King of Dragons, Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Riders race to the home of the true King of Dragons. But the Flyers are already there, and they soon come face to face with the legendary creature.

name: Dragons: Race to the Edge
overview: Unlock the secrets of the Dragon Eye and come face to face with more dragons than anyone has ever imagined as Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders soar to the edge of adventure.

episodes.name: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Part 1
episodes.overview: During their search for the escaped Dagur the Deranged, Hiccup and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object—one that holds their destiny.

episodes.name: Dragon Eye of the Beholder, Part 2
episodes.overview: Hiccup, Toothless and the dragon riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome new dragon that holds the key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

episodes.name: Imperfect Harmony
episodes.overview: The dragon riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive, never-before-seen dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

episodes.name: When Darkness Falls
episodes.overview: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the dragon riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

episodes.name: Big Man on Berk
episodes.overview: Thinking he's allergic to his best friend Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized – and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

episodes.name: Gone Gustav Gone
episodes.overview: When Dagur the Deranged captures young Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the dragon riders to get him back.

episodes.name: Reign of Fireworms
episodes.overview: Fireworm dragons invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

episodes.name: Crushing It
episodes.overview: As a Rumblehorn dragon wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick – who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

episodes.name: Quake, Rattle and Roll
episodes.overview: Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing new dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

episodes.name: Have Dragon Will Travel, Part 1
episodes.overview: The dragon riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships – and to learn exactly what the ships are.

episodes.name: Have Dragon Will Travel, Part 2
episodes.overview: A familiar face joins ranks with the dragon riders, but it's not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about the new member's true identity.

episodes.name: The Next Big Sting
episodes.overview: Hiccup, Toothless and the dragon riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

episodes.name: Total Nightmare
episodes.overview: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his best friend forever.

episodes.name: Team Astrid
episodes.overview: After an attack on Berk, Astrid trains a crew of backup Dragon Riders to battle back—but no one can guess how soon the next strike will hit.

episodes.name: Night of the Hunters, Part 1
episodes.overview: A new enemy named Ryker Grimborn captures Stormfly, sending Hiccup, Toothless and the team off to rescue her before it's too late.

episodes.name: Night of the Hunters, Part 2
episodes.overview: As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize that someone close to them is working with the enemy.

episodes.name: Bad Moon Rising
episodes.overview: After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full. Can his friends save him?

episodes.name: Snotlout Gets the Axe
episodes.overview: Snotlout and Astrid must deliver a special battle axe to a family wedding, but when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan they have to work together.

episodes.name: The Zippleback Experience
episodes.overview: After Hiccup and Toothless heroically save Barf and Belch, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt by abandoning riders Ruff and Tuff.

episodes.name: Snow Way Out
episodes.overview: Ryker is determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, so he heads to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith that the Dragon Riders are protecting.

episodes.name: Edge of Disaster, Part 1
episodes.overview: When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army.

episodes.name: Edge of Disaster, Part 2
episodes.overview: Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters.

episodes.name: Shock and Awe
episodes.overview: When a new tidal class dragon, the Sea Shocker, is found in Edge Cove, the riders must help it escape a group of hungry Scauldrons and reunite it with its migrating pod.

episodes.name: A Time to Skrill
episodes.overview: The Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless. Hiccup and the Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon.

episodes.name: Maces and Talons, Part 1
episodes.overview: Hiccup and Astrid race to stop the Dragon Hunters from tracking the Flightmare after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn.

episodes.name: Maces and Talons, Part 2
episodes.overview: After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must hatch a plan to outwit the dangerous new enemy.

episodes.name: Enemy of My Enemy
episodes.overview: While trying to take care of unfinished business, Hiccup and Toothless are lured into a trap. An unlikely rescuer comes to their aid.

episodes.name: Crash Course
episodes.overview: A wounded Fireworm seeks the Dragon Riders' help in protecting a precious treasure trove from an unfamiliar creature with strange and slimy powers.

episodes.name: Follow the Leader
episodes.overview: When things don't go well while Fishlegs is in charge, he gets another chance to prove he has what it takes to be a leader.

episodes.name: Turn and Burn
episodes.overview: When a mysterious dragon attacks Spitelouts storehouse, Spitelout and Stoick have different ideas on what to do next.

episodes.name: Buffalord Soldier
episodes.overview: After Astrid makes an alarming discovery, her life comes to depend on a dragon everyone thought was extinct. Her pals race against time to find it.

episodes.name: A Grim Retreat
episodes.overview: When the Dragon Riders fly to an island on a vacation, a small creature there has a special effect on the dragons.

episodes.name: To Heather or Not to Heather
episodes.overview: After learning that Fishlegs has been secretly communicating with Heather, the gang invites her to the Edge to convince her to join the Dragon Riders.

episodes.name: Stryke Out
episodes.overview: When Hiccup and Toothless are kidnapped and Toothless is forced to fight other dragons for entertainment, the rest of the dragon riders must save them before it's too late.

episodes.name: Tone Death
episodes.overview: The dragon riders take a dragon egg from the dragon hunters and they try to train the baby dragon. Will they be able to do it?

episodes.name: Between a Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Viggo is building an impenetrable fortress that even dragons can't break through, it's up to Hiccup and the gang to stop him.

episodes.name: Family on the Edge
episodes.overview: Heather's brother Dagur shows up out of no where and asks Hiccup for help finding her. He wants to learn to ride dragons. Dagur sees Heather on the edge and goes the extra mile to protect her.

episodes.name: Last Auction Heroes
episodes.overview: Snotlout is sent on an undercover mission to Viggo's dragon auction as part of a plan to rescue the dragons and stop Viggo from getting richer.

episodes.name: Defenders of the Wing, Part 1
episodes.overview: When Viggo offers Hiccup a truce, the wary Dragon Riders investigate and find a potential ally in their fight against the Dragon Hunters.

episodes.name: Defenders of the Wing: Part 2
episodes.overview: To prove they're on the same side and pose no threat, the Dragon Riders try to rescue Queen Mala's dragon, which Viggo stole to destroy Dragon's Edge.

episodes.name: Gruff Around the Edges
episodes.overview: Tuffnut is eager to impress his visiting cousin, Gruffnut. But Ruffnut is suspicious of his real reasons for coming to Dragon's Edge.

episodes.name: Midnight Scrum
episodes.overview: The Dragon Riders attend Berk's 400th anniversary celebration, where a bounty on Hiccup's head casts a dark shadow over the festivities.

episodes.name: Not Lout
episodes.overview: After getting bad advice from his father, Snotlout tries to seize leadership of the Dragon Riders and starts making reckless decisions on his own.

episodes.name: Saving Shattermaster
episodes.overview: Hiccup and Heather are shocked to see Dagur among the Dragon Hunters. Snotlout undergoes the Trials, a series of tests he must pass to be Mala's king.

episodes.name: Dire Straits
episodes.overview: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

episodes.name: The Longest Day
episodes.overview: During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

episodes.name: Gold Rush
episodes.overview: Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

episodes.name: Out of the Frying Pan
episodes.overview: When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

episodes.name: Twintuition
episodes.overview: When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

episodes.name: Blindsided
episodes.overview: While rescuing the dragons from a fire in the stables caused by a powerful lightning storm, Astrid suffers an injury that leaves her blind.

episodes.name: Shell Shocked: Part 1
episodes.overview: After months of planning, Hiccup launches an operation to capture the Dragon Eye from Viggo, only to find that someone else has beaten them to it.

episodes.name: Shell Shocked: Part 2
episodes.overview: The Riders learn of Ryker's attack on the Edge and attempt to stop the Shellfire and keep the Dragon Eye from being reclaimed by the Hunters.

episodes.name: Living on the Edge
episodes.overview: While trying to stabilize the volcano that threatens to destroy Dragon's Edge, the Riders discover troubling evidence of new Hunter activity.

episodes.name: Sandbusted
episodes.overview: As the Riders investigate why traders are disappearing from the Northern Markets, Hiccup and Snotlout fall victim to a treasure-hoarding dragon.

episodes.name: Something Rotten on Berserker Island
episodes.overview: The Riders accept an invite to Berserker Island, where their reunion with Heather, Dagur and a young familiar face is interrupted by a sudden revolt.

episodes.name: Snotlout's Angels
episodes.overview: When Snotlout is rescued from a storm by a tribe of winged women, he thinks he's gone to Valhalla -- until he learns he's going to be their dinner.

episodes.name: A Matter of Perspective
episodes.overview: Disobeying Hiccup, the twins follow a retiring Eruptodon to its final resting place, Vanaheim, and learn why no human has ever gone there before.

episodes.name: Return of Thor Bonecrusher
episodes.overview: The Outcast leader, Alvin, is kidnapped and held for ransom by bandits. They call on the Dragon Riders to request the assistance of Thor Bonecrusher.

episodes.name: Dawn of Destruction
episodes.overview: After the Edge is ambushed by a group of Singetails, the Riders quickly take flight to ward them off, but are shocked when they get a closer look.

episodes.name: The Wings of War, Part 1
episodes.overview: The Riders flee to Berk, where Stoick's plan for defeating the Flyers, which will require a painful sacrifice, spurs Hiccup to seek an alternative.

episodes.name: The Wings of War, Part 2
episodes.overview: An unlikely ally helps Hiccup uncover Singetail behaviors that can be exploited to conquer the Flyers. An overconfident Krogan makes a strategy error.

episodes.name: No Dragon Left Behind
episodes.overview: After Stormfly tangles with two poisonous Slitherwings while defending Garff, Astrid must risk her own life to get an ingredient to make an antidote.

episodes.name: Snuffnut
episodes.overview: When Ruffnut refuses to become Throk's bride because it would mean leaving her twin, Tuffnut fakes his own death to give her the freedom to marry.

episodes.name: Searching for Oswald ... and Chicken
episodes.overview: A sketch in an old diary leads Hiccup and Fishlegs back to Vanaheim, where they help Dagur search for his long-missing father, Oswald the Agreeable.

episodes.name: Sins of the Past
episodes.overview: When Heather goes to meet a man claiming to have seen Oswald, she walks into a trap that forces the Dragon Riders to pay a dear and unexpected price.

episodes.name: In Plain Sight
episodes.overview: While hunting for gemstones needed to complete the Dragon Eye 2, Hiccup learns an old friend isn't who he seems. Dagur faces a bully from his past.

episodes.name: No Bark, All Bite
episodes.overview: Stoick and Hiccup are led on a wild goose chase in search of willow bark for medicine, leaving Berk vulnerable to an enemy attack.

episodes.name: Chain of Command
episodes.overview: During a trip to Wingmaiden Island to find a Dragon Eye lens, Snotlout challenges Hiccup's leadership. On another island, an unlikely romance blooms.

episodes.name: Loyal Order of Ingerman
episodes.overview: Upset after learning his ancestors were Hunters who killed off Dramillions, Fishlegs sets out to see if he can find any of the dragon species left.

episodes.name: A Gruff Separation
episodes.overview: Hiccup grows wary when Gruffnut arrives on the twins' 19th birthday to administer a Thorston coming-of-age ritual involving three dangerous challenges.

episodes.name: Mi Amore Wing
episodes.overview: An announcement leads Astrid to question her relationship with Hiccup. The Riders discover an Armorwing that has a Dragon Eye lens welded to its body.

episodes.name: Ruff Transition
episodes.overview: While visiting Wingmaiden Island, a baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut, who suddenly finds herself trying her hand at being a Wingmaiden.

episodes.name: Triple Cross
episodes.overview: When the Flyers try to kill him because he's no longer useful, Viggo forces Hiccup to help him get revenge by stealing their Dragon Eye and lenses.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: After learning Krogan is using a Deathsong to lure and subdue Singetails for his growing army of Flyers, the Riders set out to rescue the dragon.

episodes.name: Darkest Night
episodes.overview: While on night patrol, Stoick is ambushed by the Flyers and gravely injured, leaving Hiccup torn between his duties as a son and as the Riders' leader.

episodes.name: Guardians of Vanaheim
episodes.overview: After learning several Flyers followed Heather to Vanaheim, the Riders must stop them from reporting the sacred island's location to their leader.

episodes.name: King of Dragons, Part 1
episodes.overview: With the fifth lens in place, the Dragon Eye 2 unveils the apparent King of Dragons, and Fishlegs immediately knows what it is and where to find it.

episodes.name: King of Dragons, Part 2
episodes.overview: The Riders race to the home of the true King of Dragons. But the Flyers are already there, and they soon come face to face with the legendary creature.
